name: 楊侑倫
objective:
本課程關注板金成形 (全英語授課)。第一部分主要探討 2 系列與 7 系列鋁合金之材料特性，及其於潛變時效成形熱處理之析出硬化機制及變形行為。第二部分為探討鋼鐵材料於熱衝壓成型過程之材料特性及熱管理。
修課前提：須具備基礎材料科學及材料力學知識、及能解基本偏微分方程式之能力、基礎 matlab 程式語言能力、有限元素軟體 (Abaqus) 操作。


This course is about sheet metal forming process. The first part of this course mainly discusses about the material characteristics of 2xxx and 7xxx series Aluminum alloys and it's precipitation behavior in Creep age forming and heat treatment process. The second part discusses about the material characteristics of steel in hot stamping process and it's thermal management in heat treatment process.

Prerequisite: Basic abalities in solving partial differencial equations (PDE), matlab codes, FE software (Abaqus)
schedule:
week 1: Introduction of the course
week 2: Introduction of Creep age forming
week 3: basic of constitutive equations for Creep age forming
week 4: basic of constitutive equations for Creep age forming2
week 5: matlab coding of constitutive equations
week 6: matlab coding of constitutive equations 2
week 7: Subroutine code
week 8: Implementation of subroutine code to FE 

week 9: Midterm exam

week 10: Introduction of hot stamping
week 11: PDE constitutive equations for hot stamping
week 12: PDE constitutive equations for hot stamping
week 13: matlab coding of constitutive equations
week 14: matlab coding of constitutive equations 2
week 15: Subroutine code
week 16: Implementation of subroutine code to FE 
week 17: Summary of course/ Repetition
week 18: Final exam
materials: LIN, Jianguo. Fundamentals of materials modelling for metals processing technologies: theories and applications. World Scientific Publishing Company, 2015.
